# CSharpGenerator.JsonSourceGenerationCondition property

The `#if` condition used around the source generated for `System.Text.Json`.

```csharp
public string? JsonSourceGenerationCondition { get; set; }
```

## Remarks

Use `true` to omit the `#if`.
